    - Copy Link and Join

name: Allure
author: Elixias Adrys
description:
WARNING: Not supported on low-end devices.

World logic contributed by Sh1penfire (@sh1penfire). Much thanks!

An attempt at an immersive content mod.

HJSON at its core, Allure seeks to do what no other mod has ever done. With RTS-centered gameplay and a focus on combat diversity, this hardcore mod aims to put difficulty and replayability onto the table. Fight enemies as two factions, each with their own unique design and weapon trees. 
Wage a new type of war on the existing planets, with much more simple yet dynamic balance of vanilla content. Does change vanilla ratios.

!!! Allure isn't meant to be played with other mods! Expect balancing issues in a multi-mod playthrough. !!!

This mod may cause rage-quits and you may get stuck at any point in progression. Skill is required. Follow the tutorials provided.

THIS UPDATE IS STILL IN EARLY DEV - PLEASE DON'T MAKE BUG REPORTS

name: Asthosus
author: Catser
description:
A mod that adds a new planet, Asthosus, into the game.
  
Asthosus is a deserted planet. A wasteland filled with danger.
It has a fully playable campaign with 11 campaign and 21 optional maps. 

Aside from these 32 maps, Asthosus contains over 180 pieces of unique content,
including blocks, liquids, items, units and status effects.
This number is not counting any internal units or environment blocks/tiles.

I aimed to re-use nearly no vanilla content and instead fill the mod 
with new and (hopefully) exciting things.

The mod comes with it's own custom music, made by ThePythonGuy3!

If you find any issues or want to tell me anything else,
feel free to join the Asthosus Discord server. 
The same thing goes for when you need help with this mod.

Asthosus is available in the following languages:
- English
- German
- Indonesian
- Russian
- Ukrainian
- Traditional Chinese
- Simplified Chinese

Enjoy!

name: Helium
author: EBwilson
description:
A mod provide optimized ui and more utilities.
Major features:
- ***In-Game Entity Information Components***: Provides various UI elements for game entities including units and blocks
- ***Health & Status Indicators***: Displays real-time status (health, shields) above units and entities. When shield stacks exceed max health, multi-layer shields with stack counters are shown.
- ***Attack Range Indicators***: Units and turrets now visualize their attack ranges as translucent areas. Processed boundaries emphasize combined team range contours to prevent visual clutter, with subtle pulsating animations and chromatic borders.
- ***Functional Block Effect Range Indicators***: Devices like Mend Projectors, Overdrive Projectors, and unit repair stations display effect ranges with distinctive colors.
- ***Enhanced Block Placement Panel***: A refined block selection panel integrating a quick item bar and standardized tool buttons.
- ***The better Mod Manager and Mod Browser***: Reworked the Mods Manager and Mods Browser, now they looks more aesthetically pleasing and functional

name: mod-tools
author: I hope...
description:
A mod provides a variety of tools for modding.

-----------------
Version 1.5.6
## Highlight
- Added some new features.
- Fixed some bugs.
-----------------

## ShowUIList

- Display `icon`, `tex`, `styles`, `colors`, `interps`\
!(./screenshots/UIList.png)

## Tester

!(./screenshots/tester.png)

- Provide `JS` editor `Tester`
- Shortcuts
- Press `Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Enter` to `execute` code immediately
- Press `Ctrl`+`Shift`+`↑/↓` to switch `history` records
- Press `Ctrl`+`Shift`+`D` to `view` detailed information
- Press `Alt`+`V` to preview `Texture`
- Built-in `unsafe`, `lookup`
- Built-in `IntFunc` class (abbreviated as `$`)
- `$.xxx` can represent primitive data types (e.g., `$.void` represents `Void.TYPE`;`$.J` represents long.class)
- `$p` represents `Packages`
- Code: [JSFunc](https://github.com/i-hope1/mod-tools/src/modtools/utils/JSFunc.java)
- Long press on code in the favorites to add to startup items\
!(./screenshots/startup.png)
- Quick switch history\
![Screenshot 2024-03-10 14-45-37](https://github.com/I-hope1/mod-tools/assets/78016895/4918af35-19af-4fab-b961-70bdc8679fe8)
- `$.item`, `$.liquid`, `$.unit` and so on.

## UnitSpawn

- Multiple team selection
- Support for fixed point spawning
- Display `name` and `localizedName`
- Rightclick the name Label to copy save as JS var.

## Selection

- Selector
- Supports `Tile`, `Building`, `Bullet`, `Unit`
- Kill
- Set Item/Liquid/Team
- Press `Ctrl`+`Alt` to fix Focus Window

## ReviewElement

- Display element list, double-click to copy element to js variable
- `Ctrl`+`Shift`+`C` to Inspect Element
- `Ctrl`+`Alt`+`D` to display bounds of Element
- Select untouchable elements
- Mobile: Filter current element with two fingers
- PC: Press `F` to filter current element
- Functions shortcuts for Element
- `i`: display details (open ShowInfoWindow)\
- `p`(for Image):  show `DrawablePicker`
- `del`: (`shift` to ignore confirmation), delete element
- `<` / `>`: collapse Group
- `f`: fix floating Info column
- `r`: invoke element's method

- ![reviewElement](./screenshots/review_element.png)

# Frag

- Double-click the blue part of Frag to minimize/restore Frag
- In the minimized state, click the blue part, it will behave like a floating ball

## Window

- Press `Ctrl`+`Tab` to switch windows
- Press `Shift`+`F4` to close current window
- RClick the close button to move and scl window.

## ShowInfoWindow

- Show all fields, methods, constructors and nested classes of a obj.
- Field can be modified.
- Method can be Invoked(Special).
- Constructor can be invoked to new a instance.

## Others

### Extensions
- Http Redirect
> Redirect some websites, such as: github\
> Configuration file: b0kkihope/http_redirect.properties

name: Technologium
author:
[#ff]retodera[] - Основатель мода; кодер, спрайтер, маппер

[#ffffff7f]Призрак[] [#0](ушёл)[] - Основатель сервера Discord

[#2f2f75]gkugfk3[] - Звуковой дизайнер

[#e5072f]Gor[] - Маппер, заместитель генератор идей

[#7f7f7f]И многие другие, которые тоже давали идеи...[]


И благодарности всем, кто поставил звёздочку <3
description:
<RU>[]

[#00fff2]Technologium[] будет очередным большим модом для Mindustry. Уже многое запланировано, хотя практически ничто из этого не сделано.



Мод будет содержать в себе 2 солнечные системы, может даже больше; множество новых механик, много кампаний, ещё больше блоков, особенно предметов, жидкостей, юнитов и не только.

Пока что, только один человек - retodera - работает над модом. Но, если вы хороший спрайтер/маппер/кодер, вы можете помочь мне с всем этим. 
Если это не так, вы всё ещё можете мотивировать меня, поставив звёздочку на репозитории.

Вы также можете присоединиться к нашему Дискорд в репозитории.

[#7f7f7f]Мод должен расти.[]




<EN>[]

[#00fff2]Technologium[] will be another big mod for Mindustry. There's already so much planned, though practically none of it is finished.



The mod will contain a whole 2 solar systems, or maybe even more; lots of new mechanics, many campaigns, even more blocks, especially items, liquids, units and not only.

For now, only one person - retodera - works on the mod. But, if you're a good spriter/mapper/coder, you could help me with all of this. 
If not, you could still motivate me by giving a star on the repository.

You also could join our shitty Discord server in the repository.

[#7f7f7f]The mod must grow.[]

This mod does not bring anything radically new to the game, but only expands the combat functionality of existing combat units.

author:
Dev - Blehhhh cat
Contributors - Kamikazefoxmk.i, Tinport, Aerodynamic Attorney 
Music Composer - Ace1020spawn
description:
A mod that adds a new planet, Kaltos, and its moon, Aetheria into the game.
  
[royal]Kaltos[] is an ancient and once life blooming planet. Now ruined by eras of industrial abuse, the life became scarce and the planet is undergoing constant ice ages. It's infested with ruins of ancient factions. 
[gold]Aetheria[] on the other hand, was always a deserted, hot celestial body. Thus resulting in 2 different factions present on [royal]Kaltos[] and [gold]Aetheria[]. 

[red]This mod is still in early development,[] as of now it only adds a bunch of [accent]sandbox only blocks[] and [accent]environment tiles[]. Several sectors have been made already, more are yet to come. It also has custom music. 

Other then that, the mod focuses on [accent]complex factories[] and [accent]refining Crude Oil[]. 

[accent]I re-used no content from vanilla, even though this mod seemingly has several things from it. 

[red]Currently the mod is way too early into development to have any proper translations. 

[]Have fun with whats already added, I guess. :)

-- 5) Build Tower that helps you build buildings (ha), which means insta-build

description:
Your schemes and saves are prone to corruption. Export your data before updating.

An extremely large mod solely dedicated for mindustry roleplaying and builds alike.

QRM V7.1 aims to fix most of the bugs found after v7's release.
QRM v7 Changelog:
Added
- Beveled sorters, Highlighted sorters, and Unloader Two chiseled sets
- Way, way more chiseled diagonal variants 
- Chiseled diagonal duct router and bezeled sets
- Hazel, Tyrian, Royal, Terracotta, Pale, Graphene Walls
- Ash and Alternate sand and red sand env walls 
- RGBCMY + White, Black Overlay floors
- CMY, Sorter gray + Source yellow floors
- Thunder, Windstorm, Thunderstorm, Rain and Ping SFX blocks
- Void messages
- Vials readded
- Message blocks that look like RP books
- [WIP] Particle gen with changeable colours via ammo
- Powerline Blockers (invisible plast walls)
- Arrow block that looks like a logic block (Path Cell)
- Ritual circles

Fixed
- Large slate message being omega
- Flat surge router is flat unloader
- Stone colour walls being named snow
- Cruiser being implemented
- Slower emanates
- All unit building
- Rocky en stairs being offset
- Config mender now a unloader
- Config nodes having glow
- Unloader two a sorter now
- Revert noise sorter changes, now unlegacy'd

QRM v7.1 Changelog
Fixed
- Bezeled chiseled side-line being offset
- Transperant, white, black item source having the wrong name
- Liquid router source not having a texture
- Particle generators not being invisible 
- Normal, inverted, highlight, bezel, spectral, source centered corners, diagonal router corner 3 being offset

name: Etigei Exile
author: [lime]Mitemi[lightgray] & [cyan]Tikup
description:
Etigei Exilium is the successor to the old Etigeox mod, featuring two planets and adding 169 blocks, 23 items, 22 units, and 22 sectors with content from the Etigeox universe. 

Establish colonies on the frozen planet of [sky]Neoulandia[white], a new campaign with its own tech tree, destructible environment, such as destructible trees from which you can harvest timber, emphasis on unit cargo, and unique map design. The entire Neoulandia campaign is interconnected with each map having direct connections to other maps, branching into economy-focused sectors, classic survival or attack maps. 

[orange]Rubiginosus[white] presents a collection of hardcore maps, inspired by Rusted Warfare, initially designed for multiplayer using Serpulo and Erekir technology. These missions have been retrofitted for a campaign experience with unique challenges for each map. Completing the Rubiginosus campaign will unlock a special resource on Neoulandia.

[red]Requires Timber (EDT) as a dependency.

[white]Discord:[blue] https://discord.com/invite/TJKZgr6UDg

波次时间短
地形复杂
敌人强大
建议多多发展后勤资源
使用发射台来提供源源不断的资源
-
The campaign of this mod is very difficult and not suitable for players who are new to this game
It is recommended to have an understanding of the game after clearing the original version before playing this mod
The difficulty of the module is reflected in:
Waves are very short
Complex terrain
the enemy is strong
It is recommended to develop more logistical resources
Use launch pads to provide a steady stream of resources

name: New Console Hardline
author: Mnemotechnician (original developer), SMOLKEYS (port maintainer)
description:
The officially acknowledged port of New Console for v147-above.

Adds a console UI superior to the built-in one and the ones provided by any other mods.
User-friendly interface, an actual code editor with syntax highlighting and indentation guides, assistance and more:
A good log panel, execution history - all of that is included in this mod.

In addition to the console, this mod offers:
- An ability to save as many scripts as you want and to either execute them or copy to the console
- An ability to execute scripts when certain events get fired
- A full-blown file browser (be careful, you can cause real harm with that!)

See README.md for more info.

name: Effects
author: hunitex
description:
Demonstrates the built-in effects of the game.

[olive]How to use?[]
Effect blocks use copper to operate. Once they get copper, they will generate the effect.
If you want to use the effect just write the block's name in your code, as their name is the same as the effect's in-game name.

The sprites are placeholders, because they are not important in this mod.

[acid]Includes a map displaying all the effects sorted by size and shape!!![]

I hope this mod helps!

IN EARLY DEV

A mod inspired by Greek tech with all of its annoying grinding Elements
a planet called lava zrogro arises and this will pinpoint where all the lore has started and will it end?

PROPER: this mod will not be easy and you have to use more brain power than serpulo, anything can go wrong leading to your death, retake the lost and crux nations and find more about the destroyed planet, also links with antopia in many ways such as sulfur, beware the sectors will be changing often.

MISSION: on zrogro your previous captures and defeats if the lost empire had been shattered, the crux empire had taken back everything, the Vengeance empire had informed you that the crux empire had some how cooked zrogro and moved the planet barely but enough for water to exist underground, your mission is to establish the vengeance empire on this planet, establish hard to work and pollute this planet to the grave, destroy and take back this planet! good luck captain.

enjoy, drink cola, eat raw coal, have fun

name: Tekton
author: ThePi14
description:
A Mindustry Java mod adding a new planet called Tekton, with it's own campaign, mechanics, hazards, blocks and units. 
	
	Tekton is a extremely cold planet far away from the sun, where a agressive faction called Hapax is located. Because of the low temperature the physical properties of many elements here are radically different from the other planets. The dense  methane rich atmosphere blocks the vision and unknown threats lure on the poles of the planet.
	
	Can you survive and thrive in this enviroment?
	
	Available languages:
	-English
	-Brazilian Portuguese
	
	[accent](The planet is based off on Titan, one of Saturns moons)[]

name: Absurd Processors
author: bufomind
description:
Warning: May impact performance on less powerful devices!
	
	Introduces five new processors. 2 balanced, 3 unbalanced.

	Absurd Processor:
	Relatively balanced, next generation processor.
	3x faster, 3x more health, and 33 more range than the Hyper Processor.
	Requires 3x the resources, 3x the Cryofluid, and ♾️x the Plastanium (for the nice green color).

	Bizarre Processor:
	Relatively balanced processor straight from the research lab.
	Titanium antenna extends range to the entire map.
	3x more health, 3x the cost, and the same speed as the Hyper Processor.

	Eyeball Processor:
	No link is too far.
	No damage is too high.
	Faster than the Logic Processor, slower than the Hyper Processor.
	Covers the entire map regardless of placement. Costs a penny.

	Planet Processor:
	All lands are charted and all threats are thwarted.
	2x faster than the Hyper Processor.
	Covers the entire map regardless of placement. Costs a penny.

	Clown Processor:
	Honk Honk.
	The clown sees all and refuses to die.
	5x faster than the Hyper Processor.
	Covers the entire map regardless of placement. Costs a penny.

Мод создан для людей без личной жизни.

Ru: Мод добавляет усложненную версию Серпуло. Изменения:

-Все второстепенные сектора имеют вражеские базы и истребляющую угрозу.

--------------------------

-All secondary sectors have enemy bases and eradication threat.
-The sector has a small chance of attack, even if it does not have any enemy bases nearby.

I advise you to reset your researches before playing on a new planet.
The mod is at the testing stage. You can give ideas for improving the mod in GitHub or in Discord - evdes#0000.

name: Machindustry
author: [gold]Urij[]
description:
[gold]Machine do nothing I can not do. It just do faster.[]




[red]E[][white]N[][cyan]: This mod is focused on the quality of the game in PvP mode on the planet Erekir. [green]Now it also works on mobile devices.[]

The following features are currently implemented:
 – Finding path for items
 – Finding path for liquids
 – Finding path for beam nodes
 – Connecting turbine condensers in the map area to the main power net
 – Changing order of the build plan queue[]




[red]R[][blue]U[][cyan]: Этот мод ориентирован на качество игры в режиме PvP на планете Эрекир. [green]Теперь он также работает на мобильных устройствах.[]

В данный момент реализованы следующие возможности:
 – Построение маршрута для предметов
 – Построение маршрута для жидкостей
 – Построение маршрута для лучевых узлов

name: Shop System
author: [#00D4FF]SamielXD[]
description:
[accent]ShopSystemMod v1.1 - Your Personal In-Game Economy![]

[white]Hey there! Ever wanted to buy resources mid-game or reward yourself for surviving tough waves? This mod adds a complete coin-based shop system to Mindustry. Think of it as your personal marketplace that grows with you as you play![]

[yellow]⚠️ Heads Up: This is an updated release! You might run into some bugs or weird behavior. If something breaks, just let me know. The save system should keep your coins safe though![]

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[lime]💰 What's This All About?[]

Basically, you earn coins by playing the game normally - killing enemies, completing waves, that sort of thing. Then you can spend those coins in the shop to buy resources, spawn units, or use special abilities. The more you play, the more stuff unlocks!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[cyan]🛒 The Shop Has:[]

[white]Resources[] → Copper, Lead, Coal, Titanium, and Thorium
[white]Units[] → Instant Flare, Dagger, and Mace squads when you need backup
[white]Boosts[] → Skip annoying waves or heal all your buildings at once
[white]Special Items[] → Buy more coins (yeah, it's meta) or spawn a whole army
[white]Pets[] → Cute little guys that earn coins for you while you play

Each item is locked at first. You'll unlock new stuff as you complete waves and level up your shop. It keeps things interesting!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[gold]⭐ VIP System (Because You're Special)[]

The more you spend, the more VIP EXP you get. Level up your VIP status and you'll earn coins way faster. At max level (VIP 5), you get 6x coins and 25% discount on everything. Pretty sweet deal!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[lime]🎮 How Do I Use This Thing?[]

Super simple:
1. Open your Settings menu (that gear icon)
2. Scroll until you see "Shop System"
3. Hit the "Open Shop" button
4. Buy whatever you want!

Your coins are shown in the top-left corner while playing. The shop button lives in settings to keep your screen clean.

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[cyan]📈 Ways to Earn Coins:[]

[white]Playing the game:[]
• Each enemy killed = 1 coin (multiplied by your VIP level)
• Each wave completed = 5 coins (also multiplied)

[white]Daily stuff:[]
• Daily Quests → Easy tasks like "kill 30 enemies" for 15-25 coins
• Daily Work → Pick a job (wave defense, hunting, building) for 30-50 coins
• Daily Login → Just log in each day for rewards up to 150 coins!

[white]Long-term:[]
• Achievements → Big milestones that give 50-100 coins
• Pets → They earn 2-15 coins per minute automatically

[white]Secret stuff:[]
• Flash Sales → Random discounts pop up (up to 50% off!)
• Redeem Codes → I hid some codes around... find them for free coins!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[yellow]🐾 About Those Pets...[]

Pets are basically passive income generators. Buy one, and it'll earn coins for you every minute - even when you're not doing anything! There are 4 pets total:

[lime]Coin Cat[] → Your starter pet, earns 2/min (unlocks Wave 5)
[gold]Gold Dog[] → The reliable choice, 4/min (unlocks Wave 10)
[cyan]Diamond Bird[] → Getting fancy, 8/min (unlocks Wave 15)
[red]Mega Dragon[] → The ultimate earner, 15/min (unlocks Wave 25)

They're expensive but worth it in the long run!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[white]🔒 The Lock System (Important!)[]

Not everything is available from the start. Items unlock based on:
• How many waves you've completed
• Your shop level (which increases as you spend coins)

When you see a locked item, it'll show you exactly what you need to unlock it. Like "🔒 Wave 5 & Shop Lvl 1". This prevents you from getting overwhelmed at the start and gives you goals to work toward.

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[cyan]💡 Some Tips From Testing:[]

• Do your daily quests! They're the easiest way to get coins early on
• Daily work can only be done once per day, so pick wisely
• Don't forget to claim your daily login reward
• Save up for pets if you're playing long sessions
• Some items have cooldowns - the shop will show you when
• Flash sales happen randomly, so check back often
• Your progress auto-saves every 30 seconds

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[red]⚠️ Known Issues:[]

• Occasionally the work system might not track progress (just cancel and restart)
• If you spam-click items super fast, weird things can happen
• The UI might look weird on very small screens
• Some achievements might not trigger immediately (give it a sec)

Nothing game-breaking, but if you find something broken, hit me up!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[lime]📊 Current Content (v1.1):[]

5 Resources • 3 Units • 2 Boosts • 2 Special Items • 4 Pets
3 Daily Quests • 3 Work Activities • 10 Login Rewards • 3 Achievements
13+ Redeem Codes • Flash Sales System • VIP Levels 1-5

[yellow]More stuff coming in future updates! This is just the foundation.[]

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[white]That's about it! The shop should be pretty intuitive once you open it. If you get stuck or confused, everything's labeled and the locked items tell you what you need.[]

[gray]Have fun, Hope you enjoy my mod! 💰[]

[white]- SamielXD[]

name: Mindustry Airstrike
author: Cra-C-Guy
description:
A Mindustry mod adding airstrikes.

The core mechanic of the mod are the Orbital Weapons, which are launched into orbit using satellites and the Launcher block.

Weapons in orbit are saved across game sessions and can be accessed from any sector on the planet they were launched from, or only from the sector they were launched from, if the sector is not on a planet (not in campaign).

Orbital Weapons are monitored via the Orbital Monitor and can be called to strike using the Beacon and the Orbital Controller.

author: Amy
description:
A little mod with a few minor additions.

I made this mod because I missed the Serpulo-style bridges on Erekir, and my wife missed the item junctions.  It also includes an alternate incinerator that is more expensive to make but free to use, as we both would have preferred the incinerator have no upkeep cost once you build it.

The intention is that nothing should be game-breaking, but just be minor little quality-of-life additions.

description:
[white]☰☰☰☰☰☰⚙️️☰☰☰️☰☰☰

[gray]Credits[lightgray] (Créditos)[gray]:
[lightgray]Azhurniy Baklan -[yellow] Erekir Utilities
[lightgray]Adamlol_gaming - [yellow] Erekir Junction
[lightgray]Kizraks (Abaines) - [yellow] Kizraks Radar

[gray]English [lightgray](Inglês)[gray]:

[brown]Thank you for choosing to purchase our most impactful product: [orange] Erekir Technologies Package[brown], a compilation of mods all in one installation. As the courier of these mechanical wonders, [orange]my mission [brown]is to equip you with the latest innovation from their official developers.

This Mod aims to encompass [orange]all[brown] Erekir mods, including a variety of blocks, units, and features to enhance your exploration of the new planet. [orange]Guaranteed advanced technologies of quality.[brown]

It's not just a Mod of Mods... it's the key to  [orange]your victory[brown] over your command.

Some mods [orange]lacked harmony or had mechanics conflicting with others[brown], prompting me to make subtle adjustments to resolve these minor issues. It's crucial to highlight that these changes are by[orange] no means intended to usurp the copyrights of the creators[brown]; on the contrary, they seek to ensure the unity of MODS!

[white]☰☰☰️☰☰☰⚙️️️☰☰☰️☰☰☰

[gray]Português [lightgray](Portuguese)[gray]:

[brown]Agradecemos sua escolha na compra de nosso produto mais impactante:   [orange]Pacote de Tecnologias Erekir[brown], uma coletânea de mods em uma só instalada. Como entregador destas maravilhas mecânicas, [orange]minha missão[brown] é equipar você com a mais recente inovação de seus desenvolvedores oficiais.

Este Mod busca abranger[orange] todos [brown]os mods de Erekir, incluindo uma gama de blocos, unidades e recursos para aprimorar sua exploração do novo planeta. [orange]É garantido tecnologias avançadas de qualidade.[brown]

Não é apenas um Mod dos Mods... é a chave de [orange]sua vitória[brown] sobre seu comando.

Alguns mods [orange]careciam de harmonia ou apresentavam mecânicas em conflito com os outros[brown], levando-me a realizar ajustes sutis para solucionar essas questões menores. É crucial destacar que essas alterações [orange]não visam de maneira alguma usurpar os Direitos Autorais dos criadores[brown]; ao contrário, buscam assegurar a unificação dos Mods!.

[white]☰☰☰☰☰☰ ⚙️️️☰☰☰️☰☰☰️

更新日志
v1.3.0
1.在设置中添加了压缩敌人的设置选项,会对所有使用了压缩器的地图波次进行修改,修改后的波次将于第5*n*n波开始出现n重压缩敌人
2.上述修改目前是不可逆的
3.正在修复bug

v1.2.0
1.修复了压缩装卸器无法选择输出物品的问题
2.大幅优化了压缩物品源极端情况下的卡顿问题
3.修复了压缩力墙投影,压缩照明器不耗电的问题
4.新增压缩液体源
5.优化了压缩激光钻头的挖掘和输出速度

v1.1.9
1.新增压缩传送带桥,压缩液体导管桥

name: ModInfo+
author: [accent]SamielXD[]
description:
[accent]ModInfo+ v1.1 📊✨[]

Track real-time GitHub download statistics for Mindustry mods directly in-game!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

🌟 [accent]What is ModInfo+?[]

ModInfo+ is a lightweight statistics viewer that connects to GitHub's API to fetch [lime]actual download counts[] for your favorite Mindustry mods. No more guessing — see exactly how popular each mod is with [cyan]real data[].

The tracker is organized into categories and displays mods in a clean, easy-to-read interface with pagination and smart caching for optimal performance.

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

📊 [accent]Features[]

[lime]✓[] Real-time GitHub statistics
[lime]✓[] Smart 5-minute caching system
[lime]✓[] Category-based organization (My Mods, Content Mods, Tool Mods)
[lime]✓[] Paginated view (2 mods per page for zero lag)
[lime]✓[] 60-second refresh cooldown
[lime]✓[] Download counts formatted (1.2K, 3.5M, etc.)
[lime]✓[] Release count tracking
[lime]✓[] Cache timer display (shows time until auto-refresh)
[lime]✓[] Color-coded status indicators
[lime]✓[] Clean, intuitive UI with navigation

🎮 [accent]How to Use[]

1. Click the [cyan]ModInfo+[] button in the main menu
2. Select a category from the top tabs
3. Browse mods (2 per page)
4. Use [lightgray]< Prev[] and [lightgray]Next >[] to navigate
5. Hit [accent]Refresh[] to update stats (1-minute cooldown)
6. Watch the cache timer count down until auto-refresh

Your tracked mods will load automatically with their latest GitHub data!

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

[cyan]How to suggest a mod:[]

🔍 [accent]How It Works[]

ModInfo+ connects to the [cyan]GitHub API[] and fetches:
- All releases for each tracked mod
- Download counts for each release asset
- Total downloads across all versions

[yellow]Smart Caching System:[]
- Stats cached for [lime]5 minutes[] per mod
- Displays time remaining until refresh
- Reduces API calls and improves performance
- Manual refresh available with 60-second cooldown

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

⚠️ [accent]Important Notes[]

[yellow]Accuracy Disclaimer:[]
Some mod info may be inaccurate due to:
- Incorrect or outdated repo links
- Typos in owner/repo names
- Forks instead of main repos
- Private or deleted repositories

If you spot an error, [cyan]please report it[] so I can fix it!

[yellow]Requirements:[]
- Active internet connection
- GitHub API access (token included)

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

📊 [accent]Tracked Statistics[]

For each mod, you'll see:
- [lime]Total downloads[] (formatted: 1.2K, 500, 2.3M)
- [cyan]Release count[] (how many versions published)
- [gray]Cache status[] (time until refresh)
- [yellow]Loading status[] (while fetching)
- [scarlet]Error status[] (if repo fails or has no releases)

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

🔄 [accent]Caching & Refresh System[]

[lime]Smart Caching:[]
- Stats cached for [cyan]5 minutes[] per mod
- Cache timer displays remaining time
- Automatic refresh when cache expires
- Separate cache for each repository

[yellow]Manual Refresh:[]
- [scarlet]60-second cooldown[] between refreshes
- Clears all cached data
- Reloads dialog with fresh stats
- Shows toast notification if cooldown active

[accent]━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━[]

name: Unit Namer
author: [#00D4FF]SamielXD[]
description:
[accent] [#FFD700]Unit Namer v1.1[] - Give Your Units Personality!

[white]Transform your gameplay by naming every unit with custom names, colors, and icons that follow them across the battlefield. Perfect for organizing squads, tracking favorites, or just having fun![]

[gray]Note: Still in beta, expect some bugs. Avoid clicking "Reset to Default" - it's currently bugged.[]

[accent] [#00D4FF]✨ New in v1.1:[]
[lime]• Icon System - Add symbols to your unit names[]
[lime]• Name Packs - Browse preset name collections[]
[lime]• Backup System - Save and restore your collections (3 slots)[]
[lime]• Smart Alerts - Get notified when named units are low health[]
[lime]• Tutorial System - Interactive guide for new users[]
[lime]• Name Validation - Auto-capitalize and content filtering[]
[lime]• Export/Import - Share your naming collections[]

[accent] [#FFD700]Core Features:[]
[white]• Tap any unit to open the rename menu[]
[white]• Custom names with 12 vibrant colors[]
[white]• 16 symbols to personalize your units (⚔️, ⚡, ★, etc.)[]
[white]• Names float above units[]
[white]• Names persist as long as the unit lives[]
[white]• Quick names menu with templates and history[]
[white]• Adjustable name size (10-90)[]
[white]• Filter: Show only your team's units[]
[white]• Auto-save every 10 seconds[]

[accent] [#00D4FF]How to Use:[]
[#BFBFBF]1. Tap on any unit in the game[]
[#BFBFBF]2. Choose from rename, color, icon, or quick names[]
[#BFBFBF]3. Enter your custom name (auto-capitalizes)[]
[#BFBFBF]4. Watch your personalized unit in action![]

[accent] [#FFD700]Pro Tips:[]
[white]• Use military names for tank squadrons (Alpha, Bravo, Charlie)[]
[white]• Track powerful units with star symbols ★[]
[white]• Organize attack groups with themed colors[]
[white]• Save backups before risky missions[]
[white]• Check settings for alerts and customization[]
[white]• Export your collection to share with friends![]

[accent] [#00D4FF]Quick Names Templates:[]
[white]Scout • Guard • Attack • Defense • Support[]

[accent] [#FFD700]Name Pack Themes:[]
[red]⚔️ Military[] [blue]🔢 Numbers[] [green]🎨 Colors[] [yellow]⚙️ Roles[] [cyan]🌊 Nature[]

[accent] [#00D4FF]Settings Menu Options:[]
[white]• Enable/Disable the mod[]
[white]• Show only your team's units[]
[white]• Auto-capitalize names[]
[white]• Health alerts on/off[]
[white]• Name size slider (10-90)[]
[white]• Tutorial toggle[]
[white]• Backup management (3 slots)[]
[white]• Name pack browser[]
[white]• Export/Import system[]

[gray]Report bugs or suggest features on GitHub[]

name: THITHANIUM

description:
Things I made for my convenience (after completing Mindustry, I re-beginned it 'cause i liked it and I made this almost working mod).
This mod adds new materials, solar panels, industries and other to make a balanced game experience, e.g. without discarding titanium in [accent]Ground Zero[], but you can do almost nothing with this if you don't use launch pads.
For now [purple]Serpulo[] only, in new releases I will make something useful also for[red] Erekir[].

[red]Warning[]: this version has test tools, because I'm still learning some features (as a combustion generators). Do not use them if you don't want to cause Mindustry crush/lag or if you want to be able to destroy things you built.
(If sonething hasn't a sprite, is experimental).

I'm still a beginner: suggestions, feedbacks and other can be send to me via e-mail:
[blue]susb84261@gmail.com.[]
or also via Discord:
[blue]Zarikar2Reshi#6207[]
Thanks in advance.

Code: [blue]Zarikar2Reshi[]
Thithanium: [blue]Zarikar2Reshi[]
Sprites: [blue]Zarikar2Reshi[] (main), fresh791
Helps: -for now nobody, see [accent]Readme.txt[] for more info.

Thank you very much! I hope you'll like my mod!

v1.0.0正式版
1.优化了代码结构,同时添加了部分注释
2.修改了科技树,现在本Mod提供的新内容会直接作为原内容的子科技节点
3.对原版的大部分内容均可进行压缩

v0.9.2
1.现在多重压缩器可以解压压缩材料了
2.去除了液体多重压缩器,液体压缩器现在能够逐层解压压缩液体了
3.现在能够对电力进行压缩了
4.新增了压缩t1空军与海军
5.修复了部分贴图bug

v0.9.1
1.使用了新的多合成工厂组件,现在不再需要多合成前置mod了
(感谢来自guiY归某人大佬的帮助)
2.略微加快了压缩器的合成速度
3.新增多重压缩火力发电机,涡轮发电机,电力节点,电池

v0.9.0
1.新增多重压缩器,能够直接将原版物品压缩为多重压缩的物品
2.新增压缩钛传送带

v0.8.7
1.现在压缩机械钻头能够提升挖掘等级了

v0.8.6
1.修复了科技树无法解锁的问题

v0.8.5
1.新增t1压缩地面单位
2.新增了原版工厂的压缩版本
3.微调了平衡性

v0.8.0
1.重写了mod的底层代码
2.现在原版全部的几乎所有非能量炮台都支持使用压缩物品作为弹药了
3.现在原版的几乎所有小型墙都具有压缩版本了
4.新增压缩水,矿渣,石油,冷冻液
5.调整了部分因为使用压缩物品而产生的属性变化

v0.7.0
1.新增压缩机械钻头
2.新增压缩传送带
3.优化了压缩物品的贴图,现在多重压缩物品的贴图不会过于暗淡/明亮了

v0.6.0
1.原版基础物品全部可以压缩了
2.原版双管,分裂,火焰完全支持使用原版弹药的压缩版本作为弹药了

v0.5.3
1.新增压缩钢化玻璃,废料,煤系列
2.原版分裂现在可以使用压缩钢化玻璃,压缩废料作为弹药
3.原版火焰现在可以使用压缩煤作为弹药
4.修复了压缩材料作为建材时不会延长建造时间的问题

v0.5.2
1.新增压缩铅,沙,钛系列
2.原版分裂炮现在可以使用压缩铅作为弹药

v0.5.1
1.每种压缩铜现在可以制作对应的城墙了

v0.5
1.新增压缩铜,新增铜压缩器
2.原版双管炮现在可以使用压缩铜作为弹药
3.构建了新的无尽压缩科技树
